wisteria trellis, wisteria arbor (arbour), wisteria pergola
Fujiwara period (esp. used as a period of art history, approx. 894-1185 CE)

game of chance similar to rock, paper scissors, where the different hand gestures symbolize a fox, a hunter and a village head
